item.title: Class War
item.description: Big Law Finance hedge funds Silicon Valley Other professionals The rising cost of elite membership Facts upper middle class american radicals self perpetuation of conservative mediocrity The alienation of elite labor Excerpts from American Affairs’ The Real Class War. Note that this post is literally me taking notes (more like copying verbatim) of what the author wrote and I have absolutely no rights to the material provided. Don’t @ me.
